name: Animus
description:
We are a company based in San Carlos de Bariloche that has a staff of designers and programmers with extensive experience.
We specialize in customized projects, following the ideas of our clients, transforming them into products and services that are profitable and guarantee a recovery of the investment. We have a very experienced and multi talented team oriented to work in projects and establish long term relationship with customers.

locations.address: Av. Bustillo km13 - San Carlos de Bariloche
